replies.body:
Why should it be locked exactly?
Yelling "Why this is not locked??" is pointless without justification and reasoning.

It's doing no harm to the community and it's in the "Off-Topic" section.

No rules have been violated so why does it need to be locked?

Please explain.

replies.body: Shouldn't this be locked? Topics surrounding one person aren't allowed, correct?
replies.body_tagged: Shouldn't this be locked? Topics surrounding one person aren't allowed, correct?

replies.body:
Topics should encourage community discussion, threads that focus on one person are frowned upon but aren't against the rules per-se.

However, if these types of topics are created multiple times, that's when staff will take action.
replies.body_tagged:
Topics should encourage community discussion, threads that focus on one person are frowned upon but aren't against the rules per-se.

However, if these types of topics are created multiple times, that's when staff will take action.

reply_to.body: Shouldn't this be locked? Topics surrounding one person aren't allowed, correct?
reply_to.body_tagged: Shouldn't this be locked? Topics surrounding one person aren't allowed, correct?

replies.body: Alright. It just seems sort of odd, since there have been many cases where threads like these have been made, but locked within 3 minutes of creation.
